SELECT sum(RD.Room_Capacity) as Threshold, RM.TYPE_CODE, RM.DESCRIPTION, RM.PRICE, COUNT(HR.TYPE_CODE) AS RESERVED_ROOM, sum(RD.Room_Capacity)-COUNT(HR.TYPE_CODE) AS AVAILABLE
FROM room_type_detail RD left join Room_type_master RM on RD.Room_Type_Id = RM.Room_Type_Id left JOIN hostel_reservation HR ON RM.Type_Code = HR.Type_Code GROUP BY RM.Type_Code;

select file_no, Room_No, Allocated_on, Allocated_By, updated_by, Checkout_on, isAllocated, Remark
from roomallocationdetail where file_no=:file_no And isAllocated = 1;
